name: La Compaña
description:
La Compaña is a short horror game based on the year 1830, Spain.

You are a writer who has come to Spain to document the culture of the country, the locals tell you something about all saints' day and after a while everything turns into a nightmare.

This game has been created for Halloween in a very few days, so don't expect too much!

You can find the game controls inside the game folder.

WASD to move Mouse to look Left click to interact with environment Right click to use the equipped object Mouse wheel to select inventory items Left shift to run ESC to pause the game and display some options

If you want to give extra support! https://www.patreon.com/cubytegames
